response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item offers unparalleled quality and functionality, making it a valuable asset for anyone looking to elevate their experience. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $15,000. This price reflects not only its current market value but also the potential long-term benefits it could bring to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or would like to discuss this further.", "product_price": 15000}
